hero.title: We Build Software that Inspires Trust
hero.subtitle: Clean, agile, and scalable solutions for your business.

about.title: About Us
about.description: At JASS Code, we help companies and people build clean, agile, and scalable software. We believe technology is the engine of innovation and growth.

aboutPage.heroSubtitle: We fuse technique and creativity to transform ideas into digital solutions.
aboutPage.whoDesc: At JASS Code, we help companies and people build clean, agile, and scalable software. Our multidisciplinary team combines clean code discipline with the fluidity of jazz, creating harmonious and unique solutions.
aboutPage.missionDesc: To drive digital transformation through innovative, scalable software solutions aligned with our clients' strategic goals.
aboutPage.visionDesc: To be recognized as a leading technology innovation company that combines technical excellence with a human and strategic focus.

cta.subtitle: Would you like to implement this service in your company?

ctaDetail.subtitle: Our team is prepared to help you implement this service in your organization.

custom.title: Custom Software Development
custom.desc: Tailored solutions based on each client’s needs.

automation.title: Process Automation
automation.desc: Eliminating repetitive tasks with bots and AI agents.

consulting.title: Software Architecture Consulting
consulting.desc: Designing secure, efficient, and growth-ready systems.

digital.title: Digital Transformation for SMEs
digital.desc: Comprehensive support in adopting modern technologies.

features.fusion: Fusion of technique and creativity: we combine clean code discipline with the fluidity of jazz, creating harmonious, efficient, and unique solutions.
features.architectures: Modern architectures: we work with microservices, scalable APIs, RPA, SaaS, and cloud-native systems, ensuring solutions are ready to grow and adapt to the future.
features.multisector: Multisector experience: our work in healthcare, education, consulting, and fintech gives us a holistic vision to apply best practices from diverse industries.
features.client: Client-focused approach: beyond software, we deliver business solutions aligned with strategic goals, not just technical requirements.
features.team: Multidisciplinary team: specialists in QA, UI/UX, mobile, fullstack, and architecture cover the entire product lifecycle.
features.agile: Agility and closeness: we use agile methodologies to quickly adapt to change while maintaining constant, transparent communication.
features.impact: Proven impact: projects like MediTrack, EduFlex, U360 Education, and CrediYa showcase our ability to generate real, scalable value.

cta.title: Ready to take your software to the next level?
cta.subtitle: Let's talk about how we can create innovative solutions for your business.
